descriptionHtml:
Th is mod adds Greek armor and weapons to Skyrim (non 300 :) )

So far SPQRLegate and I have added Greek helmets with removable plumes for males and females ( so far no khajiit or argonians )

For a future release we are planning to release Muscalata and Linothorax with removable tunics

For our next release we hope to include some Greek weapons and a few shields


also we are seeking help in creating bronze and metal textures because as it is they are not very good due to Skyrim\'s engine always brightening textures :(
author: JedJTL and SPQRLegate
